title: Amadeus Labs | SDE 3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech
Years of Experience: 8 years
Prior Experience: Product Based Company
Current CTC : 26,50,000 (All Fixed) 
Date of the Offer: Jan, 2024
Company: Siemens
Title/Level: Software Engineer -3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 30,00,000 (Fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: 2,50,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 30,00,000 + 250000= 32,50,000

Before Siemens, I was working with Jio as SDE with CTC of 36,30,000. Decided to quit in Nov 2022 because of toxic manager and bad work life balance. Gave up higher CTC to spend time with my new born.

- Although work-life balance is way too good in Siemens, but no new learnings. 
- Minimal hike as my CTC is already high, as per comapany standards.
- 3 months notice is also a problem. 
- Confused, if I should wait for better opportunity.
